Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html#/s:12OSSSpeech.name: name
Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html#/s:12OSSSpeech.abstract: The name of the voice; All AVSpeechSynthesisVoice instances have a persons name.

Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html#/s:12OSSSpeech.name: language
Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html#/s:12OSSSpeech.abstract: The name of the language being used.

Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html#/s:12OSSSpeech.name: languageCode
Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html#/s:12OSSSpeech.abstract: The language code is what is internationally used in Locale settings.

Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html#/s:12OSSSpeech.name: identifier
Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html#/s:12OSSSpeech.abstract: Identifier is a unique bundle url provided by Apple for each AVSpeechSynthesisVoice.

Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html.name: OSSVoiceInfo
Structs/OSSVoiceInfo.html.abstract: The voice infor struct ensures that the data structure has conformity and consistency.

Protocols/OSSSpeechDelegate.html#/s:12OS.name: didFinishListening(withText:)
Protocols/OSSSpeechDelegate.html#/s:12OS.abstract: When the microphone has finished accepting audio, this delegate will be called with the final best text output.

Protocols/OSSSpeechDelegate.html#/s:12OS.name: authorizationToMicrophone(withAuthentication:)
Protocols/OSSSpeechDelegate.html#/s:12OS.abstract: Handle returning authentication status to user - primary use is for non-authorized state.

Protocols/OSSSpeechDelegate.html#/s:12OS.name: didFailToCommenceSpeechRecording()
Protocols/OSSSpeechDelegate.html#/s:12OS.abstract: If the speech recogniser and request fail to set up, this method will be called.

Protocols/OSSSpeechDelegate.html.name: OSSSpeechDelegate
Protocols/OSSSpeechDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate to handle events such as failed authentication for microphone among many more.

Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.name: getResourcesBundle()
Extensions/Bundle.html#/s:So8NSBundleC12.abstract: Will return the Bundle for the SDK if it can be found.

Extensions/Bundle.html.name: Bundle
Extensions/Bundle.html.abstract: Bundle extension to aid in retrieving the SDK resource budle for getting SDK images.

Enums/OSSVoiceEnum.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKi.name: getDetails()
Enums/OSSVoiceEnum.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKi.abstract: Will return specific information about the language as an OSSVoiceInfo object.

Enums/OSSVoiceEnum.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKi.name: title
Enums/OSSVoiceEnum.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKi.abstract: Provides the Enum key itself as a String

Enums/OSSVoiceEnum.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKi.name: demoMessage
Enums/OSSVoiceEnum.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKi.abstract: Demo message is for returning a string in the language that will be read while also providing the name of the voice that Apple have provided.

Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.name: notDetermined
Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.abstract: The app’s authorization status has not yet been determined.

Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.name: denied
Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.abstract: The user denied your app’s request to perform speech recognition.

Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.name: restricted
Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.abstract: The device prevents your app from performing speech recognition.

Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.name: authorized
Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.abstract: The user granted your app’s request to perform speech recognition.

Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.name: message
Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html#.abstract: A public message that can be displayed to the user.

Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html.name: OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus
Enums/OSSSpeechAuthorizationStatus.html.abstract: The authorization status of the Microphone and recording, imitating the native SFSpeechRecognizerAuthorizationStatus

Classes/OSSVoice.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeechKit.name: quality
Classes/OSSVoice.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeechKit.abstract: You have access to set the voice quality or use the default which is set to .default

Classes/OSSVoice.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeechKit.name: language
Classes/OSSVoice.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeechKit.abstract: Language offers a get and set. The default value is United States English.

Classes/OSSVoice.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit8.name: voiceType
Classes/OSSVoice.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit8.abstract: Returns the current voice type enum to allow for obtining details.

Classes/OSSVoice.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeechKit.name: init()
Classes/OSSVoice.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeechKit.abstract: If this init is used, defaults will be used.

Classes/OSSVoice.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit8.name: init(quality:language:)
Classes/OSSVoice.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit8.abstract: This init method is required as it sets the voice quality and language in order to speak the text passed in.

Classes/OSSUtterance.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeec.name: speechString
Classes/OSSUtterance.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeec.abstract: The speechString can be a constant value or changed as frequently as you wish.

Classes/OSSUtterance.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeec.name: attributedSpeechString
Classes/OSSUtterance.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeec.abstract: The attributedSpeechString can be a constant value or changed as frequently as you wish.

Classes/OSSUtterance.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeec.name: init(string:)
Classes/OSSUtterance.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeec.abstract: Init method which will set the speechString value.

Classes/OSSUtterance.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeec.name: init(attributedString:)
Classes/OSSUtterance.html#/c:@M@OSSSpeec.abstract: Init method which will set the attributedSpeechString value.

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.name: delegate
Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.abstract: Delegate allows for the recieving of spoken events.

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.name: voice
Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.abstract: An object that allows overriding the default AVVoice options.

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.name: utterance
Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.abstract: The object used to enable translation of strings to synthsized voice.

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.name: shared
Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.abstract: A singleton object to ensure conformity accross the application it is used in.

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.name: speakAttributedText(attributedText:)
Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.abstract: Pass in an attributed string to speak.

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.name: endVoiceRecording()
Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.abstract: End recording of speech session if one exists.

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/c:@CM@OSSSpeechK.abstract: Docs available by Google searching for SFSpeechRecognitionTaskDelegate

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/c:@CM@OSSSpeechK.abstract: Docs available by Google searching for SFSpeechRecognitionTaskDelegate

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/c:@CM@OSSSpeechK.abstract: Docs available by Google searching for SFSpeechRecognitionTaskDelegate

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/c:@CM@OSSSpeechK.abstract: Docs available by Google searching for SFSpeechRecognizerDelegate

Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.name: debugLog(object:functionName:fileName:lineNumber:message:)
Classes/OSSSpeech.html#/s:12OSSSpeechKit.abstract: Method outputs a debug statement containing necessary information to resolve issues.

Classes/OSSSpeech.html.name: OSSSpeech
Classes/OSSSpeech.html.abstract: Speech is the primary interface. To use, set the voice and then call .speak(string: "your string")

Classes/OSSUtterance.html.name: OSSUtterance
Classes/OSSUtterance.html.abstract: OSSUtterance is a wrapper of the AVSpeechUtterance class.

Classes/OSSVoice.html.name: OSSVoice
Classes/OSSVoice.html.abstract: OSSVoice overides some of the properties provided to enable setting as well as getting.
